title: Obtaining approval for the Gazette Notifications published under the Revenue Protection Act, No.19 of 1962
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Mangala Samaraweera, the Minister of Finance and Mass Media, to present the Gazette Notification No.2079/32 published to revise the customs duty imposed on the importation of Beedi Leaves, to create new National Sub Division Customs Codes to identify the foods with artificial sugar and the Gazette Notification No.2080/42 published to grant duty free concessions under the Free Trade Agreement in Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.
